content: in next repeat from * 6 times 24 round 5 2 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet in next 10 2 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet in next 10 28 round 6-7 single_crochet in each around 28 - 8 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials round 8 s2tog single_crochet in next 10 s2tog x 2 single_crochet in next 10 s2tog 24 round 9 *single_crochet in next 2 s2tog repeat from * 6 times 18 to stuff it and and continue knitting round 10 *single_crochet in next s2tog repeat from * 6 times 12 round 11 *s2tog repeat from * 6 times 6 - 9 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials now put the needle through all the loops of the 6 st in a circle pull the tail and sew in the end head round 1 magic_ring of 5 tighten loop round 2 2 single_crochet in each around 10 round 3-4 single_crochet in each around 10 - 10 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials to stuff it and and leave tail for sewing legs make 8 round 1 magic_ring of 4 tighten loop round 2-11 single_crochet in each around 4 leave tails for sewing make 8 legs now put the needle through 5 and 7 rounds and tie off the two ends so that the leg gets bend - 11 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials eyes you can sew beads or glue plastic eyes you can take eyes from an old toy or make eyes out the yarn use a piece of yarn tie two ordinary knots in the middle they will be convex and sew them with the ends of the yarn to the head leave tails for sewing - 12 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials assembling the spider attach the head to the body attach the legs to 4 on each side and sew them https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials - 13 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials - 14 -
